description: It's getting pretty silly on the Next Door Buddies set as Jeremy Bilding, Paul Wagner, and Cameron Foster get ready to crank up some action. Then watch both Cameron and Paul get pounded proper in various sexy positions in this silly, fun, smoking hot scene.  Enjoy!
series: NDB - 4353 - Paul Wagner, Jeremy Bilding & Cameron Foster
